full_summary:
== Government Tender Announcement ==
Title
---------------

**Title:** Testing of Oral Interaction for Second Language Assessments

**English:** \*\*Testing of Oral Interaction for Second Language Assessments\*\*
**French:** \*\*Test d'interaction orale pour l'évaluation des langues secondes\*\*

Reference Number and Amendment Number
------------------------------------

* **Reference Number:** cb-6297-78275276
* **Amendment Number:** 6

Publication Details
-------------------

* **Publication Date:** June 9, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date (ET):** July 6, 2023, 2:00 PM
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** August 1, 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date:** March 31, 2024

Notice Type and Category
-------------------------

* **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal
* **Procurement Category:** SRV (Services)

Trade Agreements
----------------

This procurement is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)

Procurement Details
-------------------

The Human Resources Branch (HRB) of Environment and Climate Change Canada is seeking professional services to provide virtual, oral language assessments and testing to ECCC candidates. The successful contractor will be responsible for:

* Developing and administering oral language proficiency assessments in both English and French to determine a candidate’s second language oral proficiency competency(ies)
* Developing tests for oral proficiency assessments in both official languages, adhering to PSC standards and requirements, and rating scales
* Administering tests for oral proficiency in both English and French to ECCC candidates as requested in accordance with specified standard timeframes
* Electronically delivering test results and providing feedback to candidates and ECCC departmental officials within the specified standard timeframe

The period of the Contract is from the date of Contract to March 31, 2024 inclusive.

Attachments
